flavorText:
"From the highest towers to the deepest sea, all life must be touched by etherium."
—Lodus of the Ethersworn

foreignData.flavorText: „Von den höchsten Türmen bis in die Tiefe des Meeres muss alles Leben mit Ätherium erfüllt werden." —Lodus der Äthergläubige
foreignData.name: Stahlgepanzerte Schlange
foreignData.text: Die Stahlgepanzerte Schlange kann nicht angreifen, falls du nicht ein anderes Artefakt kontrollierst.

foreignData.flavorText: "Desde las más altas torres hasta el fondo del mar, toda la vida debe ser tocada por eterium." —Lodus de los etereados
foreignData.name: Serpiente acorazada
foreignData.text: La Serpiente acorazada no puede atacar a menos que controles otro artefacto.

foreignData.flavorText: « Des plus hautes tours aux mers les plus profondes, toute vie doit être touchée par l'étherium. » —Lodus des Éthermentés

foreignData.text: Le Serpent à l'habit d'acier ne peut pas attaquer à moins que vous ne contrôliez un autre artefact.

foreignData.flavorText: "Dalle torri più alte ai mari più profondi, ogni forma di vita deve avere un contatto con l'eterium." —Lodus degli Eterici

foreignData.text: La Serpe Corazzata non può attaccare a meno che tu non controlli un altro artefatto.

foreignData.flavorText: 「最も高い塔の上から最も深い海の底まで、全ての生命はエーテリウムに触れねばならぬ。」 ――エーテル宣誓会のローダス
foreignData.name: 鋼覆いの海蛇
foreignData.text: 鋼覆いの海蛇は、あなたが他のアーティファクトをコントロールしていないかぎり攻撃できない。

foreignData.name: Serpente Blindada
foreignData.text: Serpente Blindada não pode atacar, a menos que você controle outro artefato.

foreignData.flavorText: «От высочайших башен до глубочайших морских пучин эфирий должен коснуться всего живого». — Лодус из ордена Эфироблюстителей

foreignData.flavorText: 「从最高的塔到最深的海，其间所有生物都该感受乙金。」 ～乙金盟的罗得斯
foreignData.name: 覆铁巨蛇
foreignData.text: 除非你操控其他神器，否则覆铁巨蛇不能进行攻击。

name: Steelclad Serpent
originalText: Steelclad Serpent can't attack unless you control another artifact.

rulings.text: The only difference between a colored artifact and a colorless artifact is, obviously, its color. Unlike most artifacts, a colored artifact requires colored mana to cast. Also unlike most artifacts, a colored artifact has a color in all zones. It will interact with cards that care about color. Other than that, a colored artifact behaves just like any other artifact. It will interact as normal with any card that cares about artifacts, such as Shatter or Arcbound Ravager.
If you control two Steelclad Serpents, they’ll enable each other to attack.

text: Steelclad Serpent can't attack unless you control another artifact.
